jcr:root.title: Icon Text and Title

imgtext.fieldDescription: Enter the Title of the Image
imgtext.name: ./imgtitle

smallimageleftlinkright.text: Small Image Left With Link Or Text Right

Description.name: ./description
Description.validateValue: function(field){var temp=this.getValue();if(temp.length>158){this.markInvalid("Description should not exceed 150 characters");return false;}else{this.clearInvalid();return true;}}

Link_x0020_value.fieldDescription: Specify the path for the Link
Link_x0020_value.name: ./linkvalue

Description.name: ./description1
Description.validateValue: function(field){var temp=this.getValue();if(temp.length>158){this.markInvalid("Description should not exceed 150 characters");return false;}else{this.clearInvalid();return true;}}

Description.name: ./description2
Description.validateValue: function(field){var temp=this.getValue();if(temp.length>178){this.markInvalid("Description should not exceed 170 characters");return false;}else{this.clearInvalid();return true;}}

smallimageleftwithlinkortext.title: Small Image Left With Link Or Text Right

Description.name: ./description4
Description.validateValue: function(field){var temp=this.getValue();if(temp.length>240){this.markInvalid("Description should not exceed 240 characters");return false;}else{this.clearInvalid();return true;}}
